ch.aplu.turtle

Class TurtleArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.turtle.TurtleArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TurtleContainer

    public class TurtleArea
extends java.lang.Object
implements TurtleContainer
    This class is used for a turtle applet. It contains a Playground where the turtles live.

      Creates an applet window with given applet container, width, height and background color.
